predicate.note: Frames file for 'snore' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 40.1.1 and 40.2, Framenet entry Perception noise.

roleset.name: breathe loudly while sleeping

example.name: pretty boring
example.text: I expected him to say, ``I told you so,'' but he already was snoring.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: Although she denies it, Mary snores like a Mack truck going down a steep grade.
example.arg: like a Mack truck going down a steep grade

roleset.note: You probably could have figured out the MNR usage on your own, but I wanted to get in a dig at Mary.
